abstract: While there’s no denying that Xbox 360 is the first to sell the 10 million consoles, it isn’t going to hold the bragging rights for much longer.
snippet: While there’s no denying that Xbox 360 is the first to sell the 10 million consoles, it isn’t going to hold the bragging rights for much longer.
lead_paragraph: According to Microsoft, the Xbox 360 just hit a major milestone: it has become the first of the new generation of video game consoles to sell more than 10 million units in the United States (It’s up to 10.09 million, according to figures from NPD Group). A Microsoft news release crows that it continues to outsell Sony’s PlayStation 3.

headline.main: And the Winner of the Game Console Wars Is….
